abstract: Republican presidential candidate Texas Gov Rick Perry's record on criminal justice is more mixed than his tough stance on the death penalty might suggest; Perry has signed reform-minded legislation and acknowledged some of the Texas justice system's mistakes, despite vigorously defending the executions of prisoners that have occurred during his tenure as governor.
snippet: Gov. Rick Perry’s record on criminal justice is more mixed than his tough stance on the death penalty might suggest.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry’s record on criminal justice is more mixed than his tough stance on the death penalty might suggest.

headline.main: Perry Displays Varied Stance Toward Crime
headline.print_headline: Perry Displays Varied Stance Toward Crime
headline.seo: Rick Perry Displays Varied Stance Toward Crime
